PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-03982011-03-10,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActExport and Import Permits Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Export Control List
PrecisOrder Amending the EXPORT CONTROL LIST (ECL) in order to address the concerns expressed by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to clarify when an application to export an item not listed elsewhere on the ECL is required and to update the Regulation to reflect current foreign policy and security considerations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0067 Publication Date: 2011-03-30
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending the Export Control List
precis: Order Amending the EXPORT CONTROL LIST (ECL) in order to address the concerns expressed by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to clarify when an application to export an item not listed elsewhere on the ECL is required and to update the Regulation to reflect current foreign policy and security considerations.
